body_html: @skye That looks great! An example of the C interface is exactly what I have been missing. I will look into transitioning to that over the next week. I am already able to compile libtensorflow.so from source (we do have a GPU on our robot, so we need GPU acceleration). I assume the graphdef char array can just be read in from a .pb file created from the freeze_graph.py script?
